Profile.title: Profile
Profile.description: Here, you can see your profile information.

Alerts.title: Alerts
Alerts.description: Here, you can view alerts from your clusters, computing resources, and other system resources.

clusterReady.title: Cluster Available
clusterReady.description: Your cluster is now ready to use!

quotaAlmostReached.title: Compute Quota Nearly Exhausted
quotaAlmostReached.description: You're approaching the limit of available compute resources. Consider adding more.

quotaReached.title: Compute Quota Reached
quotaReached.description: Your compute resources have reached their limit. Consider adding more.

Jobs.title: Jobs
Jobs.description: This page provides a summary of the compute jobs executed under this account.

Estimate.title: Estimate
Estimate.description: Estimate the cost of your compute jobs.

estimateInProgress.title: Estimate in progress
estimateInProgress.description: Your estimate is being calculated. Please wait.

estimateReady.title: Estimate Ready
estimateReady.description: Your estimate is ready. Click here to view.

details.title: Estimate Details
details.description: Here, you can view the details of your estimate.
